table.title: Privacy goals for Nokia products
table.desc: Nokia applies privacy requirements related to the following privacy goals for Nokia products:

row.entry: means having in place privacy compliance measures, as well as monitoring and enforcing compliance to a set of industry accepted privacy principles.
means privacy is a key consideration in the creation, delivery and support of all Nokia products.
means privacy notices and information about our collection and use of personal data are provided.
means personal data collection, storage, and usage are limited to data that is relevant, adequate, and absolutely necessary for carrying out the purpose for which the data is processed.
means data shall not be linked across different domains and is processed and analyzed only for the purpose for which they were collected.
means data subjects, as well as the controller or supervisory authority have control over personal data.
means no person can access personal data without authorization.

means information technology processes and systems continuously conform to their specifications for the execution of their intended functions, and the data to be processed remains intact, complete, and up to date.
means personal data must be available and can be used properly in the intended process.
